Blue', price: '$39.99', image: '/product36.png', reviews: '4.7/5', category: 'accessories' }, { id: 37, name: 'Wella Coarse Shampoo', price: '$31.99', image: '/product37.png', reviews: '4.2/5', category: 'shampoos' }, { id: 38, name: 'Wella Color Shampoo', price: '$31.99', image: '/product38.png', reviews: '4.6/5', category: 'shampoos' }, { id: 39, name: 'Wella Nourishment Mask', price: '$27.99', image: '/product39.png', reviews: '4.4/5', category: 'masks-creams' }, { id: 40, name: 'Wella Leave-in Cream', price: '$24.99', image: '/product40.png', reviews: '4.5/5', category: 'masks-creams' }, ]; function Products({ navigateTo }) { const [filter, setFilter] = useState(''); // State to store the current filter category const [selectedProduct, setSelectedProduct] = useState(null); // State to track selected product const handleFilter = (category) => { setFilter(category); // Update the filter state when a filter is selected setSelectedProduct(null); // Clear selected product when filter changes }; const handleProductClick = (productId) => { const product = productsData.find(product => product.id === productId); setSelectedProduct(product); }; const filteredProducts = filter ? productsData.filter(product => product.category.includes(filter)) : productsData; return (

); } export default Products;
